Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PgD1 (natural AMPs; P. glauca Defensin 1, plants, 4S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (80.39%) toPsDef1C: 16%. GRAVY: -0.634; mol Wt: 5377.187; mol formula: C223H357N65O70S8; mol ex coeff: 1990.Activity:  inhibited the fungal growth C. floridanum, F. oxysporum, and N. galligena.SAR:  treatment with DTT led to loss of peptide activity, indicating the importance of disulfide bonds.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: recombinant peptide is active against  plant pathogen C. gloeosporioides isolated from onion, guava, apple, and pepper,  C. musae and C. graminicola (de Bem Matos  et al., 2024).Est.Jan2024; Updated 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Pervieux I, Bourassaa M, Laurans F, Hamelina R, Seguin A. 2004
Literature Information.Title: A spruce defensin showing strong antifungal activity and increased transcript accumulation after wounding and jasmonate treatments
